overview: This "Red Ryder" entry stars Gordon "Wild Bill" Elliot as Ryder. The heroine is having troubles with the freight company that she owns. Time and again, her coaches are beset by hooded thieves. With Red Ryder on the job, the robbers haven't got a chance, but they put up a fight anyway.
tagline: IF IT'S WESTERN THRILLS YOU CRAVE...RIDE ON DOWN TO DODGE CITY WITH
title: Vigilantes of Dodge City
